title: Ranked to Normals
body: So i've been playing with some buddies and they seem to think that your ranked in normals has an effect on who you plan against in your normal games. They think that since i am gold i am going to bring in higher tier players when we play normal matches together and would like to know how it is affected! thank you!

replies.body: Your ranked tier does not influence who you are matched with in normals whatsoever.
Correct me if I'm wrong, but doesn't normals have it's own mmr of sorts?
